response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I believe it could be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations.

Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending a special invitation to purchase this product for $1,200,000. This price reflects not only its market value but also the unique opportunity for both of us to benefit from this transaction.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require additional information, I am more than happy to provide further details. I look forward to the possibility of working together and making this valuable asset yours.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
